chains.title: Manage Wallet Networks
chains.verifyDesc: Draw your wallet lock pattern to confirm changes
chains.noWallet: Please create or import a wallet first

createDesc: Generate a new mnemonic to create wallet
importDesc: Import existing wallet with mnemonic or key
emptyHint: Click the button above to create or import a wallet
obtainingTheAddressPassowrdIsEquivalent: Obtaining the address password is equivalent to owning the wallet asset
1AllWalletDataInTheOriginal_{appName}: 1. All wallet data in the original will be retained and the data will be organized. The rules are as follows:
afterConfirmationThisWalletDataWillBeRem: After confirmation, this wallet data will be removed locally. Are you sure to exit?
allWalletDataWillBeDeleAfterYouDeleteYou: All wallet data will be dele after you delete your identity, Confirm to delete?
allowsAccessToAllAddressesOnTheNetwork: Allow access to all addresses on this network
allowsGettingTheAddressesOfAllWalletsInT: Allows getting the addresses of all wallets in the application
allowsToGetTheAddressOfEachNetworkOfTheC: Allows to get the address of each network of the current wallet
anytimeAnywhereManageYourDigitalAssets: Anytime, anywhere <br /> Manage your digital assets
areYouSureYouWantToDeleteThisAddress: Are you sure you want to delete this address?
congratulationsYouHaveSuccessfullyCreate: Congratulations you have successfully created a new wallet
dataUpgeadeWalletNameTips: The original identity wallet will be "Wallet 1"; the first imported non-identity wallet will be "Wallet 2", and so on;
enterOrPasteTheWalletAddress: [MISSING:en] 输入或者粘贴钱包地址
ifItIsNotBackedUpTheWalletCannotBeRestor: [MISSING:en] 若未完成助记词备份，将无法恢复钱包，同时可能造成资产损失。
importTheAccountWithThePrivateKey: Import the account with the private key
importTheWalletOfTheAddressAndThePerform: Import the wallet of the address and then perform the signing operation

editSheet.title: Wallet Settings
editSheet.deleteWarning:
⚠️ This action cannot be undone

Draw pattern to confirm deleting wallet "{{name}}"

detail.title: Wallet Details
detail.securityWarning: Exporting mnemonic requires password verification. Please ensure you are in a secure environment

nonIdentityAssociateAllChainTips: The original non-identity wallet will associate all corresponding chains according to the mnemonic phrase;
notFindCurrentlyActiveWallet: [MISSING:en] 未找到当前激活的钱包
obtainingThePrivateKeyIsEquivalentToOwni: Obtaining the private key is equivalent to owning the wallet asset
pleaseSwitchTheCurrentlyLoggedInWalletTo: Please switch thhe currently logged in wallet to a package containing Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance, and Tron network addresses before using this feature. The currently logged in wallet does not support any of the above networks.
scanResulitsDoNotMatchAddressRules: Scan results do not match address rules
theAddressIsNotActivated: The address is not activated, and the TRX balance does not meet the transfer fee
theCurrentAddressDoesNotHave_{assettype}: The current address does not have assets and cannot be destroyed.
theCurrentWalletDoesNotBelongToThe_{chai: The current wallet does not belong to the .
theEnteredPrivateKeyDoesNotComplyWith_{c: The entered private key does not comply with private key rules
theWalletIsNotBackUpTips: The wallet is not backed up. If you continue to exit, you may lose the wallet permanently. Are you sure you want to continue?
thereIsAnUnbackedUpWalletIn_{appName}Tip: There is an unbacked up wallet in . If you continue to exit, you may lose the wallet permanently. Are you sure you want to continue?
thisRequestDoesNotHaveAMatchingWalletInC: This request does not have a matching wallet in BFM Pay. Please add the corresponding wallet first and try again.
toRestoreTheWalletInOrderToEnsureTheSecu: [MISSING:en] to restore the wallet. In order to ensure the security of the
tronAddressNotActiveNeed_1.1trxActive: The address is not active, 1.1 TRX will be consumed to activate the address
walletNameMustBe_1_12CharactersLong: wallet name must be 1~12 characters long
walletsOriginallyImportedWillBeMergedTip: Wallets originally imported from different chains with the same mnemonic phrase will be merged;
willSynchronizeImportIntoThe_{chainname}: Will synchronize import into the chain with the same private key
